articles.description: Scotland prepare for Euro 2024 after 3-3 draw against Norway, while England and Northern Ireland are in action on Monday night.
articles.title: Euro qualifiers reaction and build-up, WSL latest

articles.description: The World Cup ended how it began, with a sense of emptiness in Ahmedabad, and now the challenge is to breathe life into the tournament for 2027, says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: 'Cricket World Cup should be enjoyed, not endured'

articles.description: The fact Scotland had sealed Euro 2024 qualification last month ago made Hampden a curious place when Norway visited, writes Tom English.
articles.title: 'Scotland go merrily from purgatory to paradise'

articles.description: A new Amazon documentary, Ronnie O'Sullivan: The Edge of Everything, offers a unique insight into the snooker legend's "hurt and suffering" alongside his most magical moments.
articles.title: Delving into O'Sullivan's 'hurt' in new Amazon doc

articles.description: Premiership Rugby stands "united" with former England international Ugo Monye following allegations of racist abuse by a supporter at Exeter Chiefs' Sandy Park.
articles.title: Monye alleges 'most blatant racism' as Exeter apologise

articles.description: Sweden's Ludvig Aberg claims his first title on the PGA Tour within six months of turning professional as he wins the RSM Classic.
articles.title: Swedish sensation Aberg wins first PGA Tour title

articles.description: Watch highlights as Manchester City win the derby 3-1 at Old Trafford in front of a record 43,615 crowd for a Manchester United WSL game.
articles.title: Highlights: Man City win at Old Trafford in front of 43,000 crowd

articles.description: Brock Purdy has a perfect statistical game for the San Francisco 49ers, while the Detroit Lions continue their fine NFL season.
articles.title: Perfect Purdy shines for 49ers and Lions win again

articles.description: England boss Gareth Southgate challenges his side to become the world's number one-ranked team, as they prepare for their final Euro 2024 qualifier.
articles.title: England boss Southgate targets top spot in rankings

articles.description: Manchester City knew there was no room for error when they turned up at Old Trafford to face rivals Manchester United with a Women's Super League title race hanging in the balance.
articles.title: Man City 'make statement' as Man Utd recognise 'clear gap'
